SEARCH
Package com.dhk.io

Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.io.SettingsManager
public class SettingsManager extends Object
This class saves the application settings in an ini file. It enables the saving of the active number of slots, the theme state, the run on startup state, the orientation modes, the display modes, the scaling modes, the DPI scale percentages, and the hot keys.
Version:
1.4.0
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2024

      Parameters:

      height - - The new display mode height for the specified slot.
      bitDepth - - The new display mode bit depth for the specified slot.
      refreshRate - - The new display mode refresh rate for the specified slot.
